name: I Want To Be Famous
description:
Everybody wants to be famous, right?

This Choose-Your-Own-Path game will let you decide which path you wish to take to be famous. There are five options (and one secret ending) you can pick. But each choice has an outcome, so choose carefully!

Content Warning: Murder, Violence

This is my first-ever interactive fiction made using Twine. And since English is not my native language, I apologize in advance for the grammatical mistakes you will see in this text-based game.

If you liked this game and wish to support my work, you can donate by clicking on the "Support This Text-Based Game" button below the game screen.

If you also have any feedback on my work or any other questions, you can reach out to me via these social media channels:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Jakeson.Eudela0327
Discord: JacobFang#4945
Twitter: https://twitter.com/JakesonLloyd

Thank you so much and hope you enjoy this game!

Credits:
Picture made using Photoshop. Shooting star image used in the cover photo came from freesvg.org
